analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub @170a * //

translated: By that, one attains power together with it.

original: ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i shes rab nyid mchog tu rtag pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i shes rab nyid mchog tu rtag pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the supreme seal of the previously explained wisdom.

original: 'dir man ngag ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the instruction:

original: lte bar padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa kha phye @184a * //
analyzed: lte bar padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa kha phye @184a * //
translated: One should imagine a red four-petaled lotus at the navel,

original: zhing steng du bltas par bsams /
analyzed: zhing steng du bltas par bsams /
translated: open and facing upward.

original: padma'i lte ba la shes rab aam gi gzugs can ma bsgoms nas der 'dab ma gzhan dag la steng dang 'og dang phyogs dang mtshams su dbyangs yig bcu bzhi po rnams bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: padma'i lte ba la shes rab aam gi gzugs can ma bsgoms nas der 'dab ma gzhan dag la steng dang 'og dang phyogs dang mtshams su dbyangs yig bcu bzhi po rnams bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having meditated on the form of the wisdom A in the center of the lotus, one should imagine the fourteen vowels on the other petals, above, below, in the directions, and in the intermediate directions.

original: de yang rgyud las ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas rab tu 'bar ba dang yang dag par ldan zhing /
analyzed: de yang rgyud las ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas rab tu 'bar ba dang yang dag par ldan zhing /
translated: Moreover, one should imagine them as blazing with the ritual as stated in the tantra, and endowed with that.

original: shin tu phra ba'i skud pa lta bur nyin gcig tsam yang rgyun mi 'chad par rnam par bsams na nges par yid ches pa skye bar 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i skud pa lta bur nyin gcig tsam yang rgyun mi 'chad par rnam par bsams na nges par yid ches pa skye bar 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
translated: If one imagines them without interruption for just one day, like very fine threads, one will certainly give rise to confidence. There is no doubt.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzugs nas chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa'i yul rnams te phyi rol du gyur pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzugs nas chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa'i yul rnams te phyi rol du gyur pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The so-called forms, etc., are the objects ranging from the form realm up to the ultimate realm of mental objects, which are of the nature of external.

original: shes rab nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: shes rab nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: By wisdom itself means by the nature of the first vowel.
